ModMetaData.name: Crimson - Rimweed
ModMetaData.author: Nikolas Makarov
ModMetaData.description:
Expand your RimWorld colony with a variety of premium cannabis strains! Grow, trade, and process different types of cannabis, each with unique effects on your pawns.
Some sound files and textures in this mod can excluded from our intellectual property. Will be removed if requested by the original author.
The rest of visual assets, including textures, models, and any other graphical elements, are the intellectual property of Â© 2025 Crimson Corps. and are protected under copyright law. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of these assets is strictly prohibited.
